Title: R.A.I.D. Special Unit
Writer: Dany Boon (adaptation), Dany Boon (dialogue), Dany Boon (screenplay), Sarah Kaminsky (adaptation), Sarah Kaminsky (dialogue), Sarah Kaminsky (screenplay)
Actors: Alice Pol, Dany Boon, Michel Blanc, Yvan Attal
Plot: The story of a woman who dreams to join an intervention group in the police department called RAID. Unfortunately, she is rather clumsy and both her family (and soon to be family-in-law) ...
